idea: Intelligible Tech Solutions is a technology and web based platform which focus at distribution of Home Automation, Network Solutions and Provide technological solutions to home users to enhance their lifestyle in the Indian market. We bring world class Home control solutions from leading manufacturers across the world. We are a scalable business model with high potential of employment generation or wealth creation as Home automation holds significant potential in the overall smart home industry in developing countries. The market is gaining growth due to rising adoption of the internet of things mostly in the developed countries. Users prefer advance standards of living where they have access to technologically connected devices, which includes televisions, refrigerators, smartphones, and many other electronic devices. Home automation is a combined network of hardware, communication software, and electronic devices that operate by integrating various smart devices such as lighting solutions, safety devices, and others, over the Internet. As per research of various organizations the home automation market is estimated to reach US $ 125 BN by 2025 across the world. We are planning to provide the services of Tracking management for the home automation sector. We have have an in-house research team who is working holistic level of micro visibility into the core of the home automation and home audio Solutions.
name: INTELLIGIBLE TECH SOLUTION PRIVATE LIMITED (OPC)

idea:
EConsultingLabs (ECLabs) was founded in 2020, as an Experienced, Personalized IT & ServiceNow Consulting company. The company has a combined experience of 25 years dealing with a different aspect of ITSM, Project Management & Cloud Computing.

Currently, the company majorly focuses on providing services in:

Process Consulting with expertise in ITSM and Project Management Area.

ServiceNow Consulting which include development and architecture

We share our experience to help projects and teams to implement process and tools suited for the infrastructure. Our ramp-up process is designed to empower your technical team and outfit them with the tools they need to succeed
name: EConsultingLabs

idea:
Cooop enables neighbours to share any and every skill in their neighbourhood and monetise them. Whether you're a juggler, banker, cook, baker, electrical engineer, artist, hair stylist, cupboard organiser, gamer - anything and everything is a skill. 

We at Cooop provide you a platform where you can share your skill within your neighbourhood as it's the best, most trusted, most easiest market you can reach out to. Why search the whole world when you can find what you're looking for at a stones throw from your house. 

Cooop is like talent/skill potluck, everyone brings something to the table. 

Everyone in a family, whether father, mother, grandparents, teenagers, youth - we all have skills that we can put out. Could be old recipes past on from generation to generation, babysitting, video gaming, business advise - all of us have something special that we will be surprised to find that someone needs. 

Moreover it's easier to search within your vicinity to find things from trusted sources versus looking around the entire world. 

Cooop makes neighbourhoods fun again. 

It's your trusted neighbourhood marketplace.
name: Cooop
